name: Gravity Forms Reset Button
author: Able Engine & William Wilkerson

sections.description:
This plugin allows you to add reset buttons to gravity forms.

The plugin requires Javascript and Jquery to function and is tested up to WordPress version 3.9 and Gravity Forms Version 1.8

To enable the reset button you only need to add a class of add-reset-button to the gravity form.

ENJOY! and happy coding ðŸ™‚
sections.installation: To install upload the folder gravity-forms-reset-button to the wp-content/plugins folder then login to your dashboard and activate the plugin.

short_description: This plugin simply makes it easy to add form reset buttons to gravity forms.
